definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person

sentences.english: The anchorage design of cable-crane is applied extensively in bridge construction.
sentences.chinese: 纜索吊機錨碇設計在橋樑施工中應用十分廣泛。

sentences.english: The pylon cell units were hoisted to the deck by the transfer derrick .
sentences.chinese: 塔室塊件由傳遞用的轉臂吊機吊放在橋面上。

sentences.english: Crane monitoring system of offshore oil drilling platform is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了海洋石油鑽井平臺吊機監測系統。

sentences.english: Erection of the pylon required a crane of 1000 ton capacity .
sentences.chinese: 塔架安裝需用起重量達1000噸的吊機。
